definition: celestial body (e.g. planet, satellite etc)/heavenly body

sentences.english: Star Wars are closely linked to conventional ground-combat.
sentences.chinese: 星球大战与地面常规作战之间有着密切的联系。

sentences.english: I crash-landed on a strange planet.
sentences.chinese: 我坠落在一个奇怪的星球。

sentences.english: Hopefully he’ll bring the Planet of the Apes series back to life.
sentences.chinese: 希望导演能让《人猿星球》系列重获新生。

sentences.english: The Death Star was to be an instrument of terror, meant to cow treasonous worlds with the threat of annihilation.
sentences.chinese: 死星是恐怖的工具，用毁灭来恐吓叛国的星球。

sentences.english: Fett was one of the best Star Wars character.
sentences.chinese: 我一直以为波巴费特是最佳的星球大战人物之一。

sentences.english: “In Stars Wars, the Death Star died twice, ” Willard continued.
sentences.chinese: 他接着说在《星球大战》中，死亡之星死了两次。

sentences.english: Dawkins wants to know if there is life on other planets.
sentences.chinese: Dawkins想知道其他星球上是否有生物。

sentences.english: Zaphod: Hey. Sorry to hear about your planet. What was it called again?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，很抱歉听到你的星球的遭遇。它叫什么来着？

sentences.english: When a large mass is there, such as a star, it will be collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 但当一个质量大嘅星球放上去，就会塌左落去。

sentences.english: And the planet can’t afford that kind of cynicism.
sentences.chinese: 这个星球可消受不起这种玩世不恭的做法。

sentences.english: I really want to watch "star wars" on the opening day.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很想在首映那天看“星球大战”。

sentences.english: Each galaxy contains myriads of stars.
sentences.chinese: 地球是银河系中的星球之一。

sentences.english: After the destruction of Varl, the Hutts migrated to other worlds.
sentences.chinese: 瓦尔毁灭之后，赫特人移居其他星球。

sentences.english: It is the sky -blue , in a less than half dark darkness, revolving star.
sentences.chinese: 它是蔚蓝色的，一小半暗的黑暗里，旋转的星球。

sentences.english: Star Wars themed alarm clock will project the time on your wall.
sentences.chinese: 这款星球大战主题闹钟会把时间投影到你的墙上。

sentences.english: But Gog doesn’t want to hear about our planet.
sentences.chinese: 可是高格不想听我们这颗星球的事。

definition: see 恆星系|恒星系[heng2 xing1 xi4]
asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
